overview: Deluxe edition digipak includes Concert in Paris at La Goutte d'or on June 30th 2005, 4 duets with Manu Chao, live duets from their concert at La Cigale (February 2005), all of their videos including their new single 'Beaux Dimanches' + making of, four short TV films plus exclusive documentary on the recording of their album in Mali. The DVD comes with an exclusive 50 minute bonus CD + booklet. The CD features an extract frm their concert in Paris.
title: Amadou & Mariam - Paris Bamako
